ai-patthana16.33:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.33:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of seeing,
ai-patthana16.33:1.1_0: (They give up) causes and conditions for the sake of seeing, not to be given up by seeing causes and conditions with cause.
ai-patthana16.33:2.1_0: (They are) not given up through vision (of the First Path); not with cause or condition.
